YOUR ORDER IS CONFIRMED
We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. If you have issues or any other questions contact us at cannabis-store@cbd.com.

ginger.passwordRecoveryDescription: Please enter the email address you used when creating your account. We will send you an email with a link to reset your password.
ginger.changePasswordDescription:
Verification code was sent to your email. If you didn’t receive the recovery email, please check your spam folder.
Once you receive the recovery email, please enter the verification code and the new password.
ginger.passwordFormatErrorMessage: Password has to be at least 6 characters long

Password was successfully changed.
You may now proceed to login with the new password.
